critique: The document is an executive order regarding the exemption of James S. Goldsmith from compulsory retirement. As the author, the President, I aim to convey a sense of stability and competence in managing government affairs. The primary emotion I want to elicit is a sense of trust and confidence in my leadership. There is a mild sense of joy that the person can continue their service. There is no indication of sadness, anger, fear, or disgust. There is a mild sense of surprise that an exception is being made.
